backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping Valentine-themed features to source files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries describing the purpose of various frontend Valentine experience files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive CSS variables for color themes, dark mode, and core styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component switching between landing and final pages, handling YES celebration flow and background UI layers.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedPromptTe: Typing-effect or fade-in animated text component for headline prompts.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusicC: Floating button managing play/pause of looping romantic background audio.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationBurst: Generates heart-burst and falling confetti animations for the YES celebration.
frontend/src/components/FinalPageGate.ts: Wrapper that restricts access to final page unless session state grants permission.
frontend/src/components/NoMessagePopup.t: Animated popup showing cute rejection messages that auto-dismiss after a delay.
frontend/src/components/ValentineBackgro: Dynamic floating hearts and sparkles background with randomized positions and animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors via Internet Identity and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and clearing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useNoButtonEvasion.ts: Implements playful NO-button evasion by randomly shifting and scaling the button and tracking dodge count.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub hook returning no backend queries for the frontendâ€‘only experience.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentineSessionGa: Manages session-based access control by storing and checking whether the user has granted Valentine access.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive Valentine-themed color variables and animations for the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Renders the final Valentine page with animated text, a couple illustration, and a celebratory message.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the main prompt with YES/NO buttons, NO-button evasion, cycling messages, and optional celebration effects.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with Valentine color tokens, custom animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Valentine experience, features, requirements, and current architectural notes.
